BR_text.BRdescription:
nnstreamer-tensorflow requires "tensorflow". However, in our PPA, tensorflow is released as "tensorflow-dev".
 Options:
 
 Make tensorflow-dev "provides" tensorflow "capabilities"
 Make nnstreamer-tensorflow "requires" tensorflow OR tensorflow-dev.
 
 This will fix <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer-example/issues/21>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer-example/issues/21</denchmark-link>
 
 CC: @dseuss
 In long term, we need to add unit-test-cases to prevent regressions of such.
 (After fixing this, I'll add a backlog for this)
